title: BBC Local Live: Merseyside and west Cheshire - BBC News
summary: police appeal for information 15 years after murder of liverpool man .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates from merseyside and west cheshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on tuesday with the latest news , sport , weather and travel updates from across the region .

documents.title: weather : showers continuing overnight
text: showers will tend to ease this evening , becoming confined to southport and other coastal parts .
elsewhere it will remain largely dry with light winds and clearer spells .
tuesday will see a mix of bright spells and showers through the day .
more from bbc weather .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: woman avoids jail despite stabbing ex-partner in the chest
text: a woman who stabbed her ex-partner in the chest has avoided jail after he refused to co-operate with police .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: liverpool named official host for armed forces day 2017
text: liverpool has been named as the official host of the national event for armed forces day in 2017 .
it will coincide with the international mersey river festival and activities will take place across the weekend of 24/25 june .
the celebrations are a chance for the public to show their support and appreciation for the armed forces , from current serving troops to families , veterans and cadets .

documents.title: john lennon classic car goes up for auction
text: a classic car once owned by beatles legend john lennon could sell for up to £ 265,000 when it goes up for auction .
the musician bought the 1956 austin princess limousine in august 1971 and used it the following year in a film to promote his album imagine .
the car still features five aeroplane seats lennon added .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: chief coroner says families deserve financial help for hillsborough-style legal battles
text: legal aid should be provided for families at inquests in which the government pays for lawyers to represent police officers or other state employees , according to the chief coroner for england and wales .
peter thornton qc will include the recommendation in his annual report .

shadow home secretary andy burnhan , who has been campaigning for the change in the wake of the hillsborough inquests conclusions , said : `` it is wrong that the police and other public bodies are able to throw around public money like confetti hiring top qcs when bereaved families have to scratch around for whatever support they can get .
`` far too often , inquests are intimidating and distressing for families still raw with grief .
`` public money should be spent on helping people get to the truth , not on protecting backs in the public sector . ''

documents.title: coroner 's office seeks wallasey man 's family
text: liverpool coroner 's office is appealing for the public 's help in tracing the family of a man from wallasey who has died .
john morgan , 61 , died at his home address in magazine lane on sunday .

documents.title: police investigate 'petrol bomb ' house fire in bootle
text: police are investigating a sus fire at a house on merseyside , with local reports suggesting a petrol bomb may have been involved .
part of seaforth road in bootle has been closed from its junction with derby road down to the shopping parade following the blaze at the terraced house earlier this afternoon .
merseyside police said the cause of the fire was not yet known .
author: Lucinda Moore
Reporter, BBC Radio Merseyside

documents.title: rugby : updated saints ' super 8s fixtures explained
text: the super league will now split into the super 8s and middle 8s after the conclusion of this weekend 's final round of fixtures .
author: St Helens Star

documents.title: cheshire £ 1bn rail vision backed by liverpool
text: a £ 1 billion rail vision for cheshire and north wales has been supported by senior figures in liverpool and manchester .
author: Chester Chronicle

documents.title: football : liverpool 's allen to have stoke medical
text: wales midfielder joe allen will have a medical at stoke on monday ahead of a £ 13m move from liverpool .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: travel : fire in building closes road in bootle
text: a fire in a building has left seaforth road in bootle closed in both directions between the sandy road junction and the a565 crosby road south junction .
more from bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: £ 5m boost for greener bus journeys on merseyside
text: almost £ 5m is to be spent on a new fleet of environmentally friendly buses across merseyside .
the department for transport is awarding merseytravel the cash for 72 biomethane , electric or hybrid vehicles .
only london is to receive a bigger chunk of money .

documents.title: football : ex-liverpool defender kolo toure signs for celtic
text: celtic have completed the signing of former liverpool defender kolo toure on a one-year deal .
the 35-year-old was signed by brendan rodgers at anfield , but found his options limited under jurgen klopp .
author: Chris McLaughlin
BBC Sport Scotland

documents.title: protest in haydock over plans to build warehouse on farmland
text: people are protesting in haydock against plans to extend one of its industrial estates .
the development would see a warehouse built on a greenfield site at florida farm .
protesters from haydock and pewfall protest at proposal for huge warehouse on farmland close to homes .
good on the protesters .
i hope they succeed .
shame on that farmer for selling out ! !

documents.title: 'beautiful ' new park to be created in liverpool
text: a stretch of vacant land is to be transformed into a `` beautiful '' new park in liverpool , the city 's mayor joe anderson has said .
the eight acre piece of land , which borders kirkdale rail station , consists of woodland and grassed areas with wildflowers and wildlife .
it will be made into a maintained park with the provisional name of melrose meadows .

documents.title: football : england boss allardyce names reds legend as assistant
text: new three lions manager sam allardyce has confirmed liverpool legend sammy lee will be his assistant with england .
speaking at a news conference at st george 's park this morning , the former bolton , newcastle and sunderland boss said : `` i will rely on his international experience .
he will join me . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: body is found in search for missing prenton man
text: merseyside police say officers investigating the disappearance of 45-year-old simon watson from prenton have found the body of a man .
author: Wirral Globe

documents.title: hmrc cleaners start two day strike over pay and hours
text: cleaners at merseyside 's hm revenue & customs offices are set to go on strike for two days in a row over pay and hours .
members of the pcs union , who are employed by the contractor iss , say their hours have been cut since the introduction of the national living wage earlier this year .
the walkout will affect offices in bootle and liverpool .

documents.title: mother 's appeal 15 years after liverpool shooting
text: a mother whose son was shot and killed by a gang of masked men in liverpool says she has been through `` 15 years of hell '' .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: 'des raid on couple in garden
text: three men armed with a metal bar threatened a couple sitting in their back garden on saturday before stealing watches and jewellery in liverpool .

documents.title: woman , 36 , found injured at bottom of stairs in wirral
text: a wirral woman is in a critical but stable condition after she was found injured at the bottom of a flight of stairs in wallasey .
the 36-year-old was discovered with a head injury in the early hours of sunday at a house on poulton road .
a man and a woman from the area have been arrested as officers investigate .

documents.title: rugby league : widnes hand dragons sixth straight loss
text: widnes win their final regular season super league game to sentence catalans dragons to a sixth consecutive defeat .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: croxteth crew killer back in court over £ 4.6m prison heroin plot
text: notorious gangland thug liam duffy is set to be sentenced for his role in a multi-million pound drugs plot run from his jail cell , reports the liverpool echo .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: fresh appeal 15 years after aigburth shooting
text: police investigating the murder of a liverpool man are making a fresh appeal for information on the 15th anniversary of his death .
police say it was around 20:00 on the evening of 25 july 2001 when richard clayton was attacked .
two men in a green ford mondeo pulled up close to him on belgrave road in aigburth - before a masked man got out and started firing shots .
the 30-year-old ran to a house to try to escape but collapsed and died .
his killers have never been brought to justice and detectives are urging anyone with information to get in touch .

text: there is heavy traffic on a58 prescot road in both directions in st helens between the freckleton road junction and the underhill road junction in the roadworks area .

feeling cooler with highs of 19c .

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: hello from liverpool , i 'm here with all your news , sport , travel and weather updates from across merseyside and west cheshire today .
if you 've got a story you 'd like me to hear about or a photograph you 'd like to share , you can contact me on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Jenny Coleman
Reporter, BBC Local Live
